com.tradersgem2.loginSystem

Class UserAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tradersgem2.loginSystem.UserAccount
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class UserAccount
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    This is the model for an individual user login. This class holds the information for an individual user account, it holds such things as user name and password. This class is immutable and serialized, only the password can be changed and it can only be changed through the setPassword method.
    Author:
    pedro
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
